overview: A young girl struggles with questions of humanity on the brink of life and death while trying to survive with a disgraced uncle who yearns for forgiveness. Compelling characters drive a powerful tale of loss and redemption among the survivors who, tested to their limits, must decide what it means to be human.
tagline: In a post-apocalyptic world where every drop of water could be their last, a young girl and her uncle struggle to survive against all odds.
title: Thirst
